about_the_game:
Faefever tells the story of a troubled journalist trying to uncover the mystery of a missing brother and sister in the small town of Glenroch, where not all things are as they seem.

A winner of two Swedish Game Awards, Faefever is a point-and-click adventure game that immerses the player in unique hand-drawn 2D graphics, a vibrant cast of characters and atmospheric music.

Explore the town of Glenroch, an old Scottish small town steeped in secrets and surrounded by a mysterious forest.

Solve puzzles that are seamlessly intertwined with the narrative and will both challenge and reward you.

Interview characters with their own goals and agendas. Decide how you want to approach them, which will directly impact their willingness to help you.

You decide how you want to go about solving the mystery of Glenroch. Many problems have several different solutions, encouraging several playthroughs in order to discover them all.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has alcoholism as a part of the narrative background, but has no direct use in the game. 

The game also includes a small amount of violence, although this is no central part of the game.
